name: Boss Basic Addons
author: Houzi2004
description: Adds new component and modules to all three kits of the Developer, Designer, Lead Developer, and SysAdmin. Edits and balances existing recipes for modules and features, adding extra complexity to the base game. This mod is a prerequisite for other mods in the Boss Suite of Startup Company mods. Please see github.com/Houzi2004/BossSuite for all info (updates will happen there first).
